column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Really enjoyed a romantic dinner for two at Ba-Ba-Reeba. Between the two of us we ordered about ten plates
column2: all of which were great. We especially loved both of the stuffed date dishes (yes
column3: we got stuffed dates twice) and the sangrias. Perfect place for a date
column5: or if you want to try a little bit of everything.
